local Link: /section/local

Student athletes at 3 North Texas high schools test positive for COVID-19

A day after a Frisco ISD student-athlete tested positive for COVID-19, an Arlington ISD and Krum ISD student did too. All three programs have been postponed.

Link: /article/news/local/arlington-isd-high-school-postpones-summer-conditioning-camp-after-student-tests-positive-for-covid-19/287-6af9758d-3a24-4059-8dd3-c8433ce62dd8

    The requirement had been waived during the COVID-19 pandemic, but the agency announced Tuesday it will go back into effect on July 6.
